original_text: He appointed also the king's portion of his substance for the burnt offerings, to wit, for the morning and evening burnt offerings, and the burnt offerings for the sabbaths, and for the new moons, and for the set feasts, as it is written in the law of the Lord.
korean_text: 또 왕의 재산 중에서 얼마를 정하여 여호와의 율법에 기록된 대로 번제 곧 아침과 저녁의 번제와 안식일과 초하루와 절기의 번제에 쓰게 하고

sentences.original_text: He appointed also the king's portion of his substance
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 왕의 소유 일부를 정하였고

sentences.original_text: to wit, for the morning and evening burnt offerings
as it is written in the law of the Lord
